description: Detects scheduled task creations that have suspicious action command and folder combinations
name: Schtasks From Suspicious Folders
query: (process.executable.text:*\\schtasks.exe AND process.command_line.text:*\ \/create\ * AND process.command_line.text:(*powershell* OR *cmd\ \/c\ * OR *cmd\ \/k\ * OR *cmd.exe\ \/c\ * OR *cmd.exe\ \/k\ *) AND process.command_line.text:(*C\:\\ProgramData\\* OR *%ProgramData%*))
author: Florian Roth
